main event: A round object, the size of a baseball, flew out then in Santa Rosa, Texas on November 23, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 hours.
The object appeared to move back and forth, changing directions suddenly.
The object did not make any noise.
The object was estimated to be 40-50 feet in diameter and very close to the ground, possibly 100 feet.
Other witnesses were identified but would not admit to seeing the object.
sighted object: a round object, the size of a baseball
